response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present our exclusive product to you. This unique offering holds significant value to us and we believe it would be equally beneficial to you. Given its importance and the benefits it provides, I am extending an opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $950,000.

Please consider this offer carefully. Should you have any questions or require more information about the product, feel free to reach out to me directly. I am here to assist you in making an informed decision.

Thank you for considering our product. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
